extension.summary: Repo for My Pi Diaries Add-ons
extension.description: Repo for My Pi Diaries Add-ons
One stop shop for the best of Overwatch
extension.disclaimer: The author of this addon do not host any of the content which is found and have no affiliation with any of the content providers. This addon simply searches websites for content. Use at your own risk!
מחבר ההרחבה זה אינו מארח את התוכן שיתכן ויימצא ואין לו זיקה לאף אחד מספקי התוכן. הרחבה רק מחפשת תוכן שקיים באתרי אינטרנט. השימוש בהרחבה הוא על אחריותך בלבד!

extension.description: Reddit Browser is an addon able to browse Reddit and play various forms of media and show text comments
Το πρόσθετο Reddit Browser είναι μια μικροεφαρμογή πλοήγησης του Reddit που επιτρέπει την αναπαραγωγή διαφόρων ειδών πολυμέσων και προβολή σχολίων και νημάτων
extension.disclaimer: Kodi is a registered trademark of the XBMC Foundation.[CR]We are not connected to or in any other way affiliated with Kodi - DMCA: legal@tvaddons.co
extension.news:
1.0.2 ~ 15-10-2018 - Minor fix for advanced search regarding the appendance of default hosts - Updated greek translation for first time prompts
1.0.1 ~ 14-10-2018 - Removed some misc google domains from default searchable domains - Added a few other domains - Amended installed size
1.0.0 ~ 13-10-2018 - Initial Version

extension.description: Tulip Routine Libraries combines the best elements from Lambda's "lamlib" and tknorris's shared modules. Also includes various enhancements, newer and improved functions and Python 3 compatibility, though the latter is largely untested.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007
extension.news:
[B]2.3.X[/B] - Add function (directory) can now set plugin category for skins to display - Changed all "BaseException" into "Exception" - Replaced builtin eval with ast.literaleval which is more secure - Added the fuzzywuzzy library for fuzzy string matching - Moved all user agent related functions and strings into new user_agent module - Added datetime keys for youtube videos - Compat module enhancements - Cleantitle module enhancements - Request function enhancements for python 3 - Directory module bugfixes - Added replace xml codes function - Youtube module performance tweaks - Update m3u8 modules (thanks globocom) - Update user agent strings - Various other tweaks
[B]2.2.X[/B] - Reincluded url_dispatcher module for addons that may use it in the future - New reload skin function - Log exception on client function upon failure - xbmc.Playlist is now callable via lambda function. Mode 1 for video (default), Mode 0 for audio - Add function in directory module now accepts streaminfo data (as dictionary) - Add function can also form a playlist instead of directory only - Add function can show background progress when loading items - Added StringIO in compat module - Plugin url optimization with join string method on directory module - m3u_maker renamed to playlist_maker - Added tvg-logo parameter into playlist_maker
